== XMLTVGrabber Readme ==
----
=== Available arguments: ===
XMLTVGrabberWin.exe `[show_window] [# of days] [output file]`<br>
<br>
_Default `#` of days: 1_<br>
_Default output file: What you set in the program GUI_<br>
<br>
=== Example: ===
*Default `#` of days, default output file:*<br>
XMLTVGrabberWin.exe false<br>
<br>
*5 days, default output file:*<br>
XMLTVGrabberWin.exe false 5<br>
<br>
*default `#` of days, custom output file:*<br>
XMLTVGrabberWin.exe false `"C:\MyGuide.xml"`<br>
<br>
*5 days, custom output file:*<br>
XMLTVGrabberWin.exe false 5 `"C:\MyGuide.xml"`<br>
